summary: Aunt Agnes (Prunella Scales) vainly tries to force Emily (Georgina Cates) to marry boring Cedric Trilling (Robert Portal) by taking them to Italy and India hoping that Emily will forget about the handsome George (Sean Pertwee).
cast: David Artus|Kevin Furlong|Nicholas Selby|John Boswall|Samuel West|Robert Portal|Prunella Scales|Georgina Cates|Frank Finlay|Jon Croft|Charles Simon|Anna Livia Ryan|Sean Pertwee|Brian Glover|Geoffrey Palmer|David Ashton|Richard Braine|Mac McDonald|Kate Harper|Peter Ustinov|Rajendra Varman|Miss Swati|Tigmanshu Dhulia|Baron Baretto|Sindhu Tolani|Shri Vallabh Vyas|John Winter|Sara-Jane Charles
title: Arrogantes y exquisitos
